story_types.name: Overcoming the Monster
story_types.description: Hero faces a great evil or threat

subtypes.name: Predator
subtypes.description: The monster actively hunts or terrorizes

subtypes.name: Avenger
subtypes.description: The monster retaliates for past wrongs

story_types.narrative_rhythm: Anticipation, Dream, Frustration, Nightmare, Thrilling Escape
key_theme: Courage and perseverance triumph over fear and oppression.
Confronting one's deepest fears leads to transformation.
Monsters are often reflections of inner demons or societal threats.
key_moment: The final confrontation where the hero defeats or escapes the monster.
The moment when fear turns into decisive action.
The realization that the monster is not invincible.
core_arc: Ordinary person becomes empowered through challenge.
Standing against evil renews identity and purpose.

story_types.name: Rags to Riches
story_types.description: Protagonist rises from humble beginnings to greatness

subtypes.name: Fall and Redemption
subtypes.description: Gains are lost before true growth

story_types.narrative_rhythm: Initial Poverty, Discovery, Temptation, Crisis, Fulfillment
key_theme: True worth comes from character, not wealth or status.
Success is hollow without self-awareness and humility.
Growth comes through adversity, not privilege.
key_moment: Moment of realization where internal growth surpasses external success.
Rejection of shallow reward in favor of personal integrity.
Breakthrough from despair into self-acceptance.

story_types.name: The Quest
story_types.description: A journey with companions, trials, and a goal
story_types.narrative_rhythm: Call to Action, Journey, Trials, Crisis, Achievement
key_theme: Growth occurs through shared adventure and sacrifice.
Every obstacle is a mirror to the hero's development.
The journey is as important as the destination.
key_moment: Sacrificial or heroic act that secures the goal after major trials.
Turning point where the hero chooses others over self.
Moment of revelation at the journey's end.

story_types.name: Voyage and Return
story_types.description: Hero enters a strange world and returns transformed
key_theme: The world's strangeness teaches the hero self-awareness and wisdom.
Personal transformation requires stepping into the unknown.
Survival leads to reflection and rebirth.
key_moment: The homecoming, when the hero reflects on how they've changed.
Escape from danger triggers internal growth.
A final test defines what the journey meant.

story_types.name: Comedy
story_types.description: Confusion and miscommunication resolved in harmony
story_types.narrative_rhythm: Mistaken Identity, Escalating Confusion, Comic Reversal, Resolution
key_theme: Chaos gives way to understanding and joyful reunion.
Truth restores harmony after absurd deception.
Laughter reveals clarity in human relationships.
key_moment: Revelation that untangles the confusion and restores harmony.
Group recognition of mistaken assumptions.
A union or celebration that resets social balance.

story_types.name: Tragedy
story_types.description: A fatal flaw leads to downfall

subtypes.name: Fatal Flaw
subtypes.description: Hubris or obsession leads to downfall

key_theme: Human flaws and hubris lead to irreversible consequences.
The more one rises, the farther there is to fall.
Blindness to truth is the seed of destruction.
key_moment: Collapse or loss that exposes the protagonist's tragic flaw.
An irreversible choice seals their fate.
Moment of self-awareness that comes too late.
core_arc: Fate and flaw converge in downfall.

story_types.name: Rebirth

subtypes.name: Seasonal Rebirth
subtypes.description: Tied to cycles of nature or holidays

key_theme: Even the lost can rediscover purpose and hope.
Compassion can reignite the human spirit.
Transformation begins with self-awareness.
key_moment: Moment of awakening that breaks isolation.
Act of kindness that inspires renewal.
Epiphany during confrontation with past mistakes.
